channel.title: VMware on Virtual Sachin
channel.description: Recent content in VMware on Virtual Sachin

item.title: P2V Nightmares: Migrating Physical Linux Boxes to VMware ESXi
item.description: The promise of P2V (Physical-to-Virtual) was seamless migration. But when I tried to virtualize our Billing Server, I ended up with a Kernel Panic and had to perform open-heart surgery on the OS.
